channel.title: Strixhaven for Storygamers
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog I look at *Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos*, the latest D&D 5e/MTG offering-- covering a wondrous school of magic. He talks about what the book does, what's interesting for storygamers, and ways to expand the material.
You can find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/strixhaven-for-storygamers
